Articles.Content:
Squad, I love you for the puns, quotes and references.

Keep it going ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit: Maybe a little hint - Pressure data can now be obtained outside of atmospheres.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T16:12:10Z" title="05/01/2015 04:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by MalfunctionM1Ke**
The definition of insanity is the look on Valentina's face at pretty much any moment.

> 
> The definition of insanity is the look on Valentina's face at pretty much any moment.

Oh god I thought it was just me

> 
> The definition of insanity is the look on Valentina's face at pretty much any moment.

What about Jeb?
To be fair, all the Kerbalnauts that are avalible for hire and use are insane to an extent. How else do you explain them willingly getting into untested rockets held together with tape and hope.
